params.displaySolutionDescription: Task is updated to contain the solution.
params.textField:
Lesson.Conversation.resources[1].questions[0].question

When you consider consumer demand, millennials, by an overwhelming amount, will choose to buy a product associated with a *social mission*. A big percentage of millenials prefer to have a *social impact* on their local *community*.
